intybasic.toolchainMode.markdownDescription: **Toolchain mode:** Choose `standalone` to configure individual tool paths below, or `sdk` to use IntyBASIC SDK wrapper scripts (only requires SDK path).

intybasic.sdkPath.markdownDescription: **SDK Path:** Path to IntyBASIC SDK root directory. **Only required when toolchainMode is set to `sdk`.** Leave empty for standalone mode.

intybasic.compilerPath.description: Absolute path to the IntyBASIC cross-compiler executable (standalone mode only).

intybasic.libraryPath.description: Absolute path to the IntyBASIC standard library folder containing 'intybasic_prologue.asm' and 'intybasic_epilogue.asm' Leave empty to use the default library bundled with the cross-compiler (standalone mode only).

intybasic.assemblerPath.description: Absolute path to the AS1600 assembler executable (standalone mode only).

intybasic.emulatorPath.description: Absolute path to the JzIntv emulator executable (standalone mode only).

intybasic.execRomPath.description: Absolute path to the 'exec.bin' ROM image.  Used by jzintv with the -e switch (standalone mode only).

intybasic.gromRomPath.description: Absolute path to the 'grom.bin' ROM image.  Used by jzintv with the -g switch (standalone mode only).

intybasic.intysmapPath.description: Absolute path to the 'intysmap' utility (standalone mode only). Note: May be obsolete with newer AS1600 versions. Leave empty to skip.

intybasic.enableIntellivoice.description: Enable Intellivoice support when running the emulator (adds -v1 flag).

intybasic.enableJlpSavegame.description: Enable JLP savegame support for FLASH persistence. Savegame file will use ROM name + .sav extension.
